inclusion.criterion: Age greater or equal to 19 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Difficult to control or intractable symptom (REF 38, page 3)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Midazolam CSCI would normally be considered for symptom management
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Informed consent is able to be provided in the English language
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Goals of care include do not resuscitate (DNR)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: For intractable symptoms, patient would prefer proportional sedation rather than no sedation or total sedation.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Second or third degree heart block (without pacemaker)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Heart rate less than 50 beats per minute
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Weight below 35 kg. or above 85 kg.
exclusion.label: met

notes: The patient is a 60-year-old Spanish man presenting with shortness of breath about a day before.
